item.title: 以色列法院为何下令征召极端东正教男子入伍？
item.description: 以色列最高法院于 6 月 25 日裁定，军队必须开始征召极端东正教犹太人。这项裁决结束了以色列建国以来的一项豁免。在以色列进行加沙战争之际，这一裁决给本雅明-内塔尼亚胡总理的联合政府带来了压力，并可能为该国 130 万极端东正教徒（又称哈里迪姆人）开启一个深刻的变革进程。如果他们开始服兵役，一些人可能会离开这个圈子。【原文：Israel’s Supreme Court ruled on June 25 that the military must start conscripting ultra-Orthodox Jews. The ruling ends an exemption that goes back to the state’s founding. It is putting pressure on Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s coalition government as Israel fights a war in Gaza and is likely to start a process of profound change for the country’s 1.3 million ultra-Orthodox, also known as Haredim. If they start to serve in the army, some may leave the fold.】
